Legal company ALBA GROUP has a team of tax advisers and highly skilled lawyers at tax law.

ALBA GROUP Experts have received experience in the largest international and domestic industrial holdings, and also in the known legal and consulting companies.

ALBA GROUP on a regular basis cooperates with a number of tax attorneys and successfully practising in various regions of Russia, Kazakhstan and the Kyrgyz Republic.

ALBA GROUP renders a full spectrum of services in taxation sphere:

  • advise on tax:
    • tax planning of the companies activity in territory of the Russian Federation, the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Republic of Uzbekistan, the Kyrgyz Republic,
    • international tax planning,
    • Legal examination of transactions and business schemes, estimation of tax consequences of planned transactions and investment projects,
    • tax advice for legal and natural persons;

  • legal support at carrying out of tax inspections:
    • analysis of legality of tax inspection carrying out,
    • analysis of legality of actions and decisions of (officials) tax authority at tax inspection carrying out,
    • complex representation of taxpayer’s interests at carrying out of tax inspection (including, development of behaviour strategy at performing of tax control measures, participation in negotiations with officials of tax authority etc.),
    • preparation of objections on the act of field tax inspection,
    • >representation of taxpayer’s interests at consideration of tax inspection files;

  • taxpayer legal protection:
    • development of strategy of dispute settlement;
    • package plan for the appeal of actions (omission) or tax authority decisions in higher tax authority (including participation in negotiations with officials of tax authorities),
    • representation of taxpayer’s interests in arbitration court (all instances) on:
      • annulment of tax authorities’ decisions on tax prosecution of taxpayer;
      • annulment of tax authorities’ decisions on collection of tax (fee), penalty, and also the penalty at the expense of money resources or other property of the taxpayer;
      • annulment of tax authorities’ decisions on suspension of taxpayer operations on its accounts in banks etc.;
      • taking steps on suspension of collecting of tax, fees, penalty and fines arrears;
      • recovery of court costs in the advantage of the taxpayer, and also the losses caused by tax authorities,
    • representation of taxpayer interests at a stage of execution of the judicial act,
    • criminal law protection of officials and natural persons in law enforcement bodies and courts of general jurisdiction.

Experts of ALBA GROUP possess all necessary professional qualities in taxation as well as experience to implement the professional activity in different regions of the Russian Federation, Kazakhstan and countries of the Central Asia, necessary for successful representation of clients’ interests.
